skipTrailingCharsUntilNewline.description: Whether or not the trailing characters until new line must be ignored. The default value is false

recordEndsOnNewline.description: Whether or not the record ends on new line. The default value is false

padding.description: The padding character. The default value is a space

nullValue.description: The string representation of a null value. The default value is null

skipEmptyLines.description: Whether or not the empty lines must be ignored. The default value is true

ignoreTrailingWhitespaces.description: Whether or not the trailing white spaces must ignored. The default value is true

ignoreLeadingWhitespaces.description: Whether or not the leading white spaces must be ignored. The default value is true

headersDisabled.description: Whether or not the headers are disabled. When defined this option explicitly sets the headers as null which indicates that there is no header. The default value is false

headerExtractionEnabled.description: Whether or not the header must be read in the first line of the test document The default value is false

numberOfRecordsToRead.description: The maximum number of record to read.

emptyValue.description: The String representation of an empty value

lineSeparator.description: The line separator of the files The default value is to use the JVM platform line separator

normalizedLineSeparator.description: The normalized line separator of the files The default value is

comment.description: The comment symbol. The default value is

lazyLoad.description: Whether the unmarshalling should produce an iterator that reads the lines on the fly or if all the lines must be read at one. The default value is false

asMap.description: Whether the unmarshalling should produce maps for the lines values instead of lists. It requires to have header (either defined or collected). The default value is false

id.description: Sets the value of the id property.
